channel.title: The Best PSN Games
channel.description:
![](upload://g5aM5saiFCMRaZCNjUb9RLySmRy.png) I've got: Wipeout HD - good but I'm bored of it atm Pac Man DX - bored of it Abe's Oddysee - Finished
DeathSpank and Dungeon Hunter look pretty good, but I'm not sure which one to get.
What are your favourite PSN games?

item.title: The Best PSN Games
item.dc:creator: Shnazliztur
item.description:
flOw & Flower are amazing games from an artistic perspective by thatgamecompany.
Anything by pixeljunk is awesome too, especially the Shooter series.
Joe Danger, kinda like LBP but on a motorcycle, also great but I only own the demo.
Burnout Paradise, enough said.
Battlefield 1943, great but the selection is limited (only 3 classes & 3 maps & one dogfighting specific map).
^I’m pretty confident you’d be happy getting all those, & if you need some help with any Burnout challeges, just send a friend request to shnazliztur (same name as this, if you didn’t notice) & I’ll be sure to help you out (also pretty confident about that because I used to be in the top 100 in the world on the racing leaderboards when I played that game religiously!)

Read full topic

item.title: The Best PSN Games
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Exclusive PSN games or games that can be downloaded from the PSN but are also on XBL?

Either way, I’ve got BF 1943 and Mortal Kombat 2.
